doctext.text: Microblaze Processor Model

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Apache 2.0 Open Source License

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Instruction Set: This model fully implements the instruction set upto and including V10.

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: Privileged Instructions: Implemented

doctext.name: txt_2
doctext.text: Virtual-Memory Management: Implemented

doctext.name: txt_3
doctext.text: Reset, Interrupts, Exceptions and Break: Implemented

doctext.name: txt_4
doctext.text: Floating Point Unit: Implemented

doctext.name: txt_5
doctext.text: Stream Link Interface: Implemented

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: GDB: There is a known issue in the microblaze gdb, a lockup can occur when disassembling from address 0
